v1.2.0 - Changelog
- The application will now automatically check for new updates online. - Added a new option to select all Characters. - Added a new option to stop upon detecting a set amount of Skill Points or more. - Added a new option to stop upon detecting a warning popup like lack of fans. - Changed color of overlay button to distinctly show when the bot is running or not. - Various bugfixes.
